data.title: Luxury Resort in Detroit, Michigan
data.meta_description: Saint John's Resort & Hotel, situated just 20 min from Detroit Metro Airport & Downtown Detroit, has everything from corporate events, luxury weddings to private dining experiences.
data.text:
An iconic landmark surrounded by natural beauty on our 200 acres, Saint John’s offers an idyllic setting for moments in life that matter most—the wedding of your dreams, your next corporate event, family holiday, or relaxing getaways. Saint John's expansive grounds and luxurious accommodations offer the perfect escape from the ordinary. We invite you to experience genuine hospitality at our legendary resort.

Saint John’s Resort is also home to Five Steakhouse, where world-class cuisine is served in our elevated contemporary dining room and lounge. Delight your palate with menu options that include both traditional and unique fare.

​

Also located on our property is the Wine Grotto, which recently opened in Sept 2023. Our mission is to help guests to navigate the world of wine, one sip at a time. Whether you are a seasoned wine drinker or novice, we offer a unique experience for all. Anticipate small plates with big flavor alongside imaginative desserts that are designed to amplify your perfect pour.

​

Resort amenities encompass a full fitness center with Peloton bikes and pool/jacuuzi/cold-water bubbler for kids, a four-season heated Trackman driving range and short-game practice area, and an all new golf complex opening in fall 2023. Perfectly situated 24 minutes from the Detroit Metro Airport, Downtown Detroit and Ann Arbor, our hotel and resort has everything you need to make every moment of your stay worthwhile.

​
